Definition.Name: Okta Remediation Block
Definition.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.
Definition.Creator: e22b1df1-d620-4af5-ba42-d29e1b73bfe9

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep>During the investigation of the alert it was decided to disable the user account."}

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: MultiChoiceQuestion
Steps.Description: This step conditions the progress of the playbook according to a question the analyst has to answer manually, would be used most for questions which can't be answered automatically

Parameters.Name: Question
Parameters.Value: Do you to procede with remediation steps?

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Tools_Set Context Value
Steps.Description: The action sets a key and value in a specific context (alert or case)

Steps.Name: Okta_Reset Password
Steps.Description: Generate a one-time token that can be used to reset a user's password

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"User IDs Or Logins":"[Event.event_principal_user_emailAddresses]","Send Email":true,"Also Run On Scope":false}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep> No users to update."}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep>During the investigation of the alert it was decided to reset the user password."}

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"User IDs Or Logins":"[Event.event_principal_user_emailAddresses]","Is Deactivate":false,"Send Email If Deactivate":false,"Also Run On Scope":false}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep> During the investigation of the alert, it was decided that no remediation steps would be taken."}
